faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Facturly and how it can transform your invoice management

whatIs.question: What is Facturly and who is it for?
whatIs.answer: Facturly is an invoice management platform designed for freelancers, small businesses and professionals who want to simplify their invoicing. It's perfect for independents who want to save time and teams looking for a professional invoice management solution.

emailSending.question: How does email invoice sending work?
emailSending.answer: When you create an invoice, you can send it directly by email to your client. They will receive a secure link to view, accept and pay the invoice online. The system automatically tracks the invoice status and notifies you of payments.

integrations.question: Can I integrate Facturly with my existing tools?
integrations.answer: Yes! Facturly offers integrations with the most popular accounting tools. Our API also allows you to connect Facturly to your existing system.

freePlan.question: What does the free plan include?
freePlan.answer: The free plan includes up to 10 invoices per month, unlimited client management, email sending, basic dashboard and email support. It's perfect for getting started and testing the platform.

onlinePayment.question: How does online payment work?
onlinePayment.answer: When a client accepts an invoice, they can pay it directly online via a secure link. Payments are processed securely and you are notified instantly. The invoice is automatically marked as paid in your dashboard.

security.question: Is my data secure with Facturly?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-level security measures including end-to-end encryption, secure data transmission and compliance with industry standards. Your financial data is protected and never shared without your explicit authorization.
